item.title: UK government sets out plan to phase out animal experiments
item.description: The plan follows up on a manifesto promise to work towards the phasing out the practice.

item.title: 'There was blood everywhere': Delhi residents recount horror of huge car explosion
item.description: Eyewitnesses describe what they saw after the blast near the Red Fort in the Indian capital.

item.title: Six dead after second typhoon in a week hits the Philippines
item.description: Fung-wong was the 21st typhoon to hit the South East Asian nation this year.

item.title: US Senate passes funding bill as historic shutdown nears likely end
item.description: It will need to be approved by the House and then signed into law by the president before the government can reopen.

item.title: Syria to join US-led coalition to defeat IS group after Trump meeting
item.description: Ahmed al-Sharaa, once branded a terrorist by the US, became the first Syrian leader to visit the White House.
